member.name: T:MusicPlayerBackend.SoundEngine
member.summary: Implements for handling of audiofiles and communication to audiodevices. The underlying API can be subject to change, but the output and consistensy will remain. Playing happens .

member.name: E:MusicPlayerBackend.SoundEngine.onUpdatePlayProgress
member.summary: Called every second while playing an audio file. Containing the latest progress, synced with the actual replay as .

member.summary: Called when a replay is finished regulary, not paused or manually stopped.

member.summary: Represents the actual stream handle. Only usefull for the engine itself.

member.summary: Represents the actual device handle. Only usefull for the engine itself.

member.name: P:MusicPlayerBackend.SoundEngine.CurrentProgress
member.summary: Represents the current progress of replay in Milliseconds.

member.name: P:MusicPlayerBackend.SoundEngine.CurrentMaxPlayDuration
member.summary: Represents the actual maximal replay duration for the current stream in Milliseconds.

member.summary: Represents the safed MetaData of the current or last played audio file.

member.summary: Contains available devices by description usually the name. Can be used with the handle to determine the actual device name.

member.summary: Does all the Init to properly use the . No external configuration is needed.

member.summary: Frees all acquired resources, as well as stopping all related running threads.

member.summary: Starts playing the requested audio file. Background a new task is started with proper cancellation token.

member.summary: Stops the task related to playing the song. The progress is not affected.

member.summary: Starts resuming the requested audio file. Background a new task is started with proper cancellation token.
